name: Skittleball
description:
Tilt your iPhone, iPod Touch or iPad to roll a ball to knock over numbered pins in order. Avoid falling down the black holes. Roll over the green button to open the doors to the outer rooms.

Play in top-down view (like a marble game) or landscape view (like a racing game). Switch between views at any time by just tilting the device.

Race the clock. Repeat previous levels for a new best time. Over 30 challenging levels. Saves best times and last unlocked level.

Universal App - supports iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad, including standard, Retina, and iPhone 5 displays. Adapts to iPad's larger screen by showing a wider play area.
